title: Crypto Price Prediction Today 24 July ‚Äì XRP, Solana, Dogecoin
body: Bitcoin pulled the entire crypto industry up by the bootstraps after it skyrocketed to a record-breaking price of $122,838 last Monday. This achievement reignited bullish momentum among traders, but Bitcoin has since pulled back 3.5% although hopes are still high for a fresh breakout soon. This impressive upswing has also propelled major altcoins and the best meme coins upward, with XRP, TRON, Sui Network, Solana, Pepe, Trump, SPX6900, and FartCoin all reaching new all-time highs, fuelling confidence in continued market expansion. Additionally, with the total crypto market capitalization now standing just below $4 trillion, a slight correctional phase has begun to stabilise prices, evidenced by a 5.1% decline over the entire market these past 24 hours. As anticipation grows around a potential major bull market, investors are focusing on digital assets poised to surpass their former highs. Ripple (XRP): Cross-Border Payments Crypto Giant Hits Fresh ATH Price Ripple‚Äôs XRP has become the world-leading connection between traditional payments systems and blockchain. On July 18, it established a new record high at $3.65, surpassing its previous peak of $3.40 set back in 2018. Currently priced at $3.18, XRP is down 13.4% from its recent high, indicating it is now correcting, although given the bounty of positive recent XRP developments, bullish traders continue eyeing another upward run. Thanks to its rapid settlement capabilities and minimal transaction fees, XRP has garnered strong institutional interest. Even the United Nations has acknowledged its potential for allowing seamless cross-border payments without the need for legacy banking intermediaries. Following prolonged legal challenges, Ripple secured a landmark victory in 2023 when a U.S. court ruled that XRP‚Äôs retail sales are not securities transactions. By 2025, the SEC had officially closed its case, eliminating longstanding regulatory ambiguity and fortifying XRP‚Äôs market position. This regulatory clarity has driven strong investor interest, pushing XRP‚Äôs price up by over 406% compared to last year ‚Äì far outperforming Bitcoin‚Äôs 78% gain in the same period. XRP‚Äôs relative strength index (RSI) has fallen to 61 from Monday‚Äôs overheated 86, indicating a sell-off is gathering momentum. This is only logical; after an impressive 45% rally over the last thirty days ‚Äì outpacing Bitcoin‚Äôs 13% rise in the same period ‚Äì some traders are taking profits. In the last 24 hours, XRP slipped by 8.3% and may continue to fall until its RSI reaches the neutral 50 and its price converges with its 30-day moving average, represented by the blue line on the chart above. Should this materialise, XRP fans can expect strong support around its previous resistance near $3. From late last year to early April, a bullish flag formation emerged, often a precursor to rapid price surges, suggesting a possible push toward $4 by autumn. Solana ($SOL): Could This Lightning-Fast Blockchain Hit New Crypto Price Peaks by Fall? Solana ($SOL) has built a reputation as a DeFi powerhouse thanks to its exceptional speed, low fees, and advanced smart contract functionalities. Its market cap has surpassed $100 billion, with a total value locked (TVL) of approximately $10 billion , according to DeFiLlama data. There is growing speculation that Solana might soon see approval for a spot ETF, mirroring the earlier approvals granted to Bitcoin and Ethereum. Such a move could channel substantial institutional capital into SOL, solidifying its standing as a strong Ethereum alternative. Adding to its momentum, President Donald Trump recently proposed that Solana be included in a potential U.S. Crypto Reserve ‚Äì a program under which the government would hold confiscated Solana assets obtained through enforcement actions. On the price front, Solana has rebounded from its April low of $100 after reaching $250 in February and currently trades at $187, up 30% over the past thirty days. Its RSI is at 62, downtrending from an overbought 82 on Tuesday. However, it remains well-supported at its current level and at $150, allowing room for consolidation before another potential rally. Despite ongoing geopolitical uncertainties, this consolidation phase has reinforced Solana‚Äôs market foundation. Key resistance remains at $200 and $250, and a strong breakout could see SOL surpass its previous all-time high of $293.31 and potentially breach the $300 mark by autumn. Dogecoin ($DOGE): Is the Meme Coin Set to Reach $1? Initially created as a parody in 2013, Dogecoin ($DOGE) has grown into a leading meme coin with a market cap exceeding $35.7 billion and a loyal global community. This world-first meme coin gained massive attention in 2021 following endorsements from celebrities like Elon Musk, Gene Simmons, and Snoop Dogg. Renewed institutional interest this May reignited upward momentum, driving DOGE towards $0.25. It is now trading near $0.2393, up 31% over the past week, outperforming Bitcoin, Ethereum, XRP, and Shiba Inu during that timeframe ‚Äì once again demonstrating its tendency to outpace leading tokens during bull runs. Technical indicators suggest this uptrend could continue, though with its RSI downtrending from a too-high peak of 85 on Monday to 62 today, we can see a broad sell-off is gathering momentum. Ultimately, this is better for Dogecoin. Even though the price has fallen 7% in 24 hours, it just means traders are now locking in recent profits and in doing so, the coin is returning to a fair price, which will provide it with stability ahead. Once its price converges with its 30-day moving average, it will be stable enough to manage a potential climb towards $0.50 by late summer. The token‚Äôs utility is expanding too, with Tesla accepting DOGE for merchandise purchases and integrations from PayPal and Revolut broadening its real-world usage. Snorter ($SNORT): Low Price Entry into Advanced Crypto Trading Bot and Meme Coin Ecosystem Spotting promising projects before they go mainstream is key to outsized crypto gains. While major altcoins hold their momentum, new tokens continue to present fresh opportunities. One such emerging project is Snorter ($SNORT) , a hybrid meme token and trading bot built on Solana with plans for cross-chain integration. Operating within Telegram, Snorter delivers real-time market insights directly into chat groups. Offering competitive transaction fees as low as 0.85%, Snorter rivals bots such as BonkBot, Maestro, and Trojan. Its features include MEV-protected swaps, copy trading, rug pull detection, and limit order sniping, positioning it as a versatile tool for crypto traders. Investor demand has been strong, with its presale raising over $2.3 million so far. Snorter‚Äôs staking program offers yields up to 176% APY, incentivising early backers. Currently priced just under ten cents, token prices increase gradually with each presale round, encouraging early participation. Whether you‚Äôre an experienced trader or exploring meme coins for the first time, Snorter seeks to provide a user-friendly and powerful platform for navigating today‚Äôs dynamic crypto environment. Keep up with Snorter on X , Instagram , or join the presale on the Snorter website . The post Crypto Price Prediction Today 24 July ‚Äì XRP, Solana, Dogecoin appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: SK Hynix rides Nvidia AI wave to record Q2 earnings, beats out local rival Samsung
body: SK Hynix is making record profits due to the increasing demand for AI chips, particularly from Nvidia. This performance has propelled it past its competitor, Samsung, in the high-end memory space. SK Hynix reported a major boost in Q2 earnings following rising demand for its AI-focused memory chips. The South Korean firm reported an operating profit of ‚Ç©9.2T, which is about $6.7B, for the second quarter, a 68% increase from the same period last year as demand for high-bandwidth memory (HBM) chips used in AI systems continues to rise. Revenue rose 35% to ‚Ç©22.2T, about $16.1B, exceeding analyst forecasts of ‚Ç©20.6T, according to Yonhap Infomax. SK Hynix outearns Samsung again in Q2 SK Hynix has outgained Samsung Electronics in advanced memory sales for the second quarter in a row, mainly because of its position as the leading supplier of HBM chips to Nvidia. SK Hynix pointed out growing investment in sovereign AI, which refers to government efforts aimed at developing independent national AI infrastructure, as a source of demand in the future. The company‚Äôs shares went up by more than 2% in early trading, following the earnings release. SK Hynix‚Äôs performance contrasts with that of Samsung‚Äôs, which projected a 56% profit decline in Q2. One of the major causes is its struggle to meet Nvidia‚Äôs strict requirements for its AI chips. SK Hynix‚Äôs share price has tripled since the beginning of 2023, with Bank of America analysts forecasting further growth in global HBM revenue from $35.7B in 2024 to $57.5B in 2027. Source: Google Finance What does the memory chip market look like in 2026? Despite SK Hynix‚Äôs momentum, analysts are pointing out potential risks further down the line. Analysts at Goldman Sachs reduced their rating for the company from ‚ÄúBuy‚Äù to ‚ÄúNeutral‚Äù in a note published last week. As more memory chip makers expand production, the competition is expected to intensify. Goldman Sachs warned that HBM pricing could decline for the first time next year, as the market gets more saturated. SK Hynix‚Äôs reliance on Nvidia especially leaves it exposed to changes in customer strategy or pricing leverage. This could become a problem if Nvidia decides to diversify suppliers or push for lower prices. Analysts have also identified areas of opportunity for competitors like Samsung. Goldman Sachs stated that application-specific integrated circuit (ASIC) chips may become the fastest-growing segment in the HBM market. As SK Hynix focuses on supplying Nvidia, it gives Samsung the opportunity to target companies building their own ASIC chips.Samsung may be able to benefit from Nvidia resuming shipments of its less advanced H20 AI chip to China. title: Crypto Liquidations Near $1 Billion As XRP, Dogecoin Crash 10%
body: The cryptocurrency derivatives market has suffered heavy liquidations as altcoins like XRP (XRP) and Dogecoin (DOGE) have plummeted. Crypto Has Seen Almost $1 Billion In Liquidations During The Past Day According to data from CoinGlass, the cryptocurrency derivatives sector has been shaken up by a wave of liquidations in the last 24 hours. ‚ÄúLiquidation‚Äù here refers to the forceful closure that any open contract undergoes when its losses exceed a certain percentage (as defined by the platform). Related Reading: When Will Ethereum Turn Overheated? Report Says Watch This Level Below is a table that breaks down the numbers related to the latest liquidations in the digital assets market: As displayed, the cryptocurrency sector has seen a whopping $967 million in derivatives contract liquidations over the past day. Out of these, an overwhelming majority of the positions involved were long ones. More specifically, users betting on a bullish outcome took a beating of around $829 million. These mass liquidations have come as assets across the market have witnessed some degree of bearish price action. The likes of XRP and Dogecoin are currently down about 10%. Interestingly, Bitcoin (BTC) hasn‚Äôt been affected by this latest sector-wide downturn, suggesting that the decline could be a result of investors rotating capital out of altcoins. Given BTC‚Äôs relatively flat action, it‚Äôs not surprising to see that the number one cryptocurrency hasn‚Äôt been leading in liquidations this time around. From the above heatmap, it‚Äôs visible that Ethereum (ETH) has topped the market with a derivatives flush of almost $200 million, while XRP has come second with liquidations of $115 million. Despite the fact that Bitcoin hasn‚Äôt actually moved much in the past day, users have still managed to rake up $84 million in liquidations. Solana (SOL) and Dogecoin wrap up the top 5 with figures sitting at $58 million and $56 million, respectively. The mass liquidation event from the past day may be a product of overheated conditions that had already been brewing in the sector. As on-chain analytics firm Glassnode has revealed in its latest weekly report, the Open Interest across the top altcoins has seen a significant increase since the start of July. The ‚ÄúOpen Interest‚Äù here refers to an indicator that keeps track of the total amount of futures positions related to an asset that are currently open on all centralized exchanges. As shown in the chart, the metric‚Äôs combined value for Ethereum, Solana, XRP, and Dogecoin sat at $26 billion at the start of the month, but it has now grown to $44 billion. Related Reading: XRP Whales Move $759M In Token: What Are They Up To? Historically, an excess of leverage has often led to volatility for the market, so the latest squeeze could just be this effect in motion. XRP Price At the time of writing, XRP is floating around $3.17, down 4% in the last week. Featured image from Dall-E, Glassnode.com, CoinGlass.com, chart from TradingView.com

title: Analyst Who Called Recent XRP Dump Just Dropped Another Prediction
body: The recent sharp decline in the crypto market caught many traders, including XRP holders, off guard, but one analyst saw it coming. Crypto Bitlord (@crypto_bitlord), a veteran investor active since 2011, had warned the day before that a major downturn was imminent. On the same day, XRP dropped from above $3.5 to a low of $2.99, while Bitcoin fell from over $120,000 to below $118,000. That decline caught many unprepared, especially given the strong bullish sentiment that had built around XRP following its recent climb to a new all-time high . Will the Market Shift Again? Now, Crypto Bitlord has followed up with another post, this time saying, ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs about to be a big pump in crypto.‚Äù The reversal in tone from one of the space‚Äôs most seasoned voices has caught the attention of traders looking for direction. There‚Äôs about to be a big pump in crypto https://t.co/TkBMtiYu9z ‚Äî Crypto Bitlord (@crypto_bitlord7) July 24, 2025 While he didn‚Äôt specify which assets he expects to rally, many are looking to XRP as a primary candidate for an imminent surge. The analyst has previously shown interest in XRP, recently predicting a rapid surge to $12 for the asset. Other analysts have marked the $3.65 level, XRP‚Äôs all-time high, as a crucial breakout zone. It is widely viewed as a potential launchpad for a significant continuation, possibly into double-digit territory if momentum sustains. With bulls still actively defending key support zones and accumulating during the dip, sentiment around XRP remains positive. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 Technical Outlook Supports Price Recovery The broader market setup also provides a favorable backdrop. Bitcoin appears to have found temporary support, and altcoins are beginning to show signs of strength once again. While XRP has not reached its highs from yesterday, it is trading at $3.21, showing signs of a new recovery phase. XRP has also drawn renewed interest because of its technical structure and increasing conviction among long-term holders. A well-respected technical analyst recently drew attention to a cup and handle pattern on the digital asset‚Äôs chart, potentially targeting $7 despite the market turbulence. Market observers will now watch closely to see whether XRP can reclaim $3.5 support level. A clear move above it could validate the bullish expectations. Crypto Bitlord‚Äôs recent track record commands respect. Having been active in the space since 2011, many consider him an expert, and multiple signs in the current market suggest that the massive pump he predicted could materialize soon. title: Bitcoin Cycle Theory: Why CryptoQuant CEO Says It‚Äôs Profoundly Obsolete Now
body: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Cycle Theory: Why CryptoQuant CEO Says It‚Äôs Profoundly Obsolete Now Are you still basing your Bitcoin investment decisions on the familiar ebb and flow of past cycles? If so, you might be missing a crucial paradigm shift. According to Ki Young Ju, the insightful CEO of leading on-chain analytics firm CryptoQuant, the traditional Bitcoin cycle theory as we knew it is no longer applicable. This isn‚Äôt just a minor adjustment; it‚Äôs a profound structural change that redefines how we understand Bitcoin‚Äôs market dynamics, driven primarily by an unprecedented wave of institutional adoption. What Was the Traditional Bitcoin Cycle Theory ? For years, the crypto community largely operated under a predictable framework. The traditional Bitcoin cycle theory often mirrored the halving events, suggesting a four-year pattern of market behavior. This theory was built on observable patterns of retail investor sentiment and the actions of large individual holders, often dubbed ‚Äòwhales‚Äô. Accumulation Phase: After a market downturn, ‚Äòwhales‚Äô (large individual investors) would quietly accumulate Bitcoin at lower prices, often when retail interest was at its lowest. Mark-Up Phase: As Bitcoin‚Äôs price began to rise, often fueled by halving narratives and renewed interest, retail investors would gradually re-enter the market, driven by FOMO (Fear Of Missing Out). Distribution Phase: At market peaks, whales would strategically sell their holdings, taking profits as retail investors enthusiastically bought in, believing the rally would continue indefinitely. Mark-Down Phase: The market would then enter a correction or bear market, leading to retail capitulation and the cycle repeating. This model, while imperfect, provided a useful lens for many to navigate Bitcoin‚Äôs volatile landscape. It emphasized the power of large individual holders to influence price and the emotional swings of the retail crowd. However, the game has fundamentally changed. The Profound Shift: Why Bitcoin Cycle Theory No Longer Applies Ki Young Ju‚Äôs recent declaration on X (formerly Twitter) marks a pivotal moment in how we perceive the market. He stated unequivocally that the traditional Bitcoin cycle theory ‚Äîbased on whale accumulation and retail exits‚Äîno longer holds true. Why the dramatic shift? Because the very players driving the market have changed. Ju points to a significant structural transformation: ‚Äòold whales‚Äô are now selling their Bitcoin, but not to the usual retail buyers. Instead, they are selling to ‚Äònew long-term holders‚Äô, and these aren‚Äôt just other individual investors. These new holders are predominantly institutions. This suggests that institutional adoption of Bitcoin is far deeper and more pervasive than many previously imagined. Consider the stark contrast between the old and new market dynamics: Aspect Old Market Dynamics (Traditional Bitcoin Cycle Theory ) New Market Dynamics (Institutional Shift) Primary Buyers at Peaks Retail investors (FOMO-driven) Long-term institutional holders Primary Sellers at Peaks Individual ‚Äòwhales‚Äô Old generation of ‚Äòwhales‚Äô / Early adopters Market Drivers Retail sentiment, individual whale actions, halving narratives Institutional capital inflows, regulatory developments, long-term strategies Holding Horizon Often shorter-term (retail), mid-term (some whales) Significantly longer-term (institutions) Volatility Impact Higher due to emotional trading and rapid shifts Potentially lower due to stable, large-scale holding This shift implies a more mature market, one less susceptible to the emotional whims of individual traders and more influenced by the calculated, long-term strategies of financial giants. Who Are These New Institutional Players Driving Bitcoin Adoption? The term ‚Äòinstitutional adoption‚Äô isn‚Äôt just a buzzword; it represents a tangible influx of significant capital from established financial entities. These players are fundamentally different from the early individual investors who dominated Bitcoin‚Äôs formative years. Spot Bitcoin ETFs: The approval and launch of spot Bitcoin Exchange-Traded Funds (ETFs) in major markets like the U.S. have opened the floodgates for traditional investors to gain exposure to Bitcoin without directly holding the asset. Firms like BlackRock, Fidelity, and Ark Invest are now accumulating vast amounts of Bitcoin on behalf of their clients. Publicly Traded Corporations: Companies like MicroStrategy have famously adopted Bitcoin as a primary treasury reserve asset, demonstrating a corporate belief in its long-term value. Hedge Funds and Asset Managers: Increasingly, traditional hedge funds and asset management firms are allocating portions of their portfolios to digital assets, recognizing Bitcoin as a legitimate asset class. Sovereign Wealth Funds and Pension Funds: While still early, there are growing discussions and even initial moves by these colossal funds to explore Bitcoin as a diversification tool. These entities operate with different mandates, regulatory frameworks, and investment horizons compared to individual traders. Their purchases are often strategic, driven by macroeconomic factors, portfolio diversification, and a belief in Bitcoin‚Äôs long-term store of value proposition, rather than short-term price speculation. This fundamentally alters the supply-demand dynamics that underpinned the old Bitcoin cycle theory . Implications for Your Bitcoin Investment Strategy If the traditional Bitcoin cycle theory is indeed obsolete, what does this mean for individual investors? It calls for a re-evaluation of strategies and a shift in perspective. Firstly, expecting the market to behave exactly as it did in 2017 or 2021 might lead to misguided decisions. The ‚Äòpump and dump‚Äô cycles driven by individual whales may give way to more sustained, albeit potentially slower, growth driven by consistent institutional inflows. This could lead to: Reduced Volatility: As more Bitcoin moves into the hands of long-term institutional holders, less supply is available for speculative trading, potentially smoothing out extreme price swings. Emphasis on Fundamentals: While technical analysis remains valuable, understanding the broader macroeconomic landscape, regulatory developments, and institutional adoption trends becomes even more critical. Long-Term Horizon: The case for Bitcoin as a long-term store of value, rather than a short-term trading instrument, is significantly strengthened. Actionable insight: Focus on dollar-cost averaging (DCA) and maintaining a long-term perspective. Resist the urge to time the market based on outdated cyclical patterns. Instead, monitor institutional flows and fundamental adoption metrics. Navigating the New Era: The Importance of Data Ki Young Ju‚Äôs admission that his prior market prediction was mistaken highlights a crucial point: even experts can be wrong when the underlying market structure changes. His pledge to focus on more data-driven insights going forward is a testament to the evolving landscape. In this new era, on-chain analytics platforms like CryptoQuant become indispensable. They provide the granular data necessary to track institutional movements, monitor exchange flows, analyze whale wallets (both old and new), and understand the true supply dynamics. This data offers a more reliable compass in a market no longer guided by predictable cycles. Relying on sophisticated data tools helps investors and analysts to: Identify genuine accumulation zones, regardless of traditional cycle timing. Distinguish between short-term speculative selling and long-term distribution by early adopters. Gauge the health and depth of institutional demand. This commitment to data over dogma is what will truly empower investors to navigate Bitcoin‚Äôs future. The landscape of Bitcoin is undergoing a monumental transformation. The era of the traditional Bitcoin cycle theory , driven primarily by retail emotions and individual whale maneuvers, is giving way to a new paradigm defined by the steady, strategic hand of institutional capital. This profound shift, as highlighted by CryptoQuant CEO Ki Young Ju, isn‚Äôt just a minor blip; it‚Äôs a fundamental restructuring of Bitcoin‚Äôs market dynamics. For investors, this means letting go of outdated models and embracing a data-driven, long-term perspective focused on Bitcoin‚Äôs evolving role as a globally adopted institutional asset. The future of Bitcoin promises to be less about cyclical pumps and dumps, and more about sustained, foundational growth. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) 1. What is the traditional Bitcoin cycle theory ? The traditional Bitcoin cycle theory suggested a predictable four-year pattern, often tied to Bitcoin halving events. It described phases of accumulation by ‚Äòwhales‚Äô (large individual investors) during bear markets, followed by price rallies fueled by retail FOMO, and then distribution by whales at market peaks, leading to corrections. 2. Why does CryptoQuant CEO Ki Young Ju believe this theory no longer applies? Ki Young Ju argues that a structural shift has occurred. Instead of old whales selling to retail investors, they are now selling to new, long-term institutional holders. This profound institutional adoption changes the fundamental supply-demand dynamics and makes the old cycle patterns less relevant. 3. Who are the ‚Äònew long-term holders‚Äô driving this shift? These ‚Äònew long-term holders‚Äô are primarily institutional players, including Spot Bitcoin ETF providers (like BlackRock, Fidelity), publicly traded corporations (like MicroStrategy), hedge funds, and asset managers who are increasingly allocating significant capital to Bitcoin for long-term strategic purposes. 4. How does deeper institutional adoption impact Bitcoin‚Äôs market? Deeper institutional adoption can lead to several impacts: potentially reduced volatility due to less speculative trading, a stronger emphasis on Bitcoin‚Äôs fundamentals, and a reinforcement of its role as a long-term store of value rather than a short-term trading asset. It shifts market drivers from retail sentiment to institutional capital inflows. 5. What should individual investors do given this market shift? Individual investors should re-evaluate strategies based on outdated cyclical patterns. It‚Äôs advisable to focus on a long-term investment horizon, consider dollar-cost averaging, and rely more on data-driven insights and fundamental analysis of institutional flows and adoption trends, rather than attempting to time the market based on past cycles. Did you find this analysis insightful? Share this article with your friends and fellow crypto enthusiasts on social media to help them understand the evolving landscape of Bitcoin and the end of the traditional Bitcoin cycle theory ! To learn more about the latest explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin institutional adoption. This post Bitcoin Cycle Theory: Why CryptoQuant CEO Says It‚Äôs Profoundly Obsolete Now first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Russia Reports x10 Rise In Registered Crypto Mining Firms
body: A senior Moscow lawmaker says the number of Russian crypto mining firms signed up to the Federal Tax Service‚Äôs register has risen tenfold in the past six months. The Russian media outlet RBC reported that MPs claim that more than 1,000 firms are now ‚Äúlegally‚Äù mining coins. And this has led one political leader to claim that crypto is the ‚Äúfuture‚Äù for many Russian businesses. Rise in Russian Crypto Mining Firms The head of the New People People Party, the lawmaker Alexey Nechaev, told attendees at a State Duma plenary session on July 23: ‚ÄúWhen crypto mining was emerging [in Russia], there were many who wanted to ban it. But it is clear now that the future belongs to cryptoassets. Mining will continue to develop.‚Äù The total Bitcoin hashrate over the past 12 months. (Source: Blockchain.com) He also confirmed that per FTS data, the number of ‚Äúwhite‚Äù miners in Russia has increased 10 times since the start of the year. A new Russian law, introduced last year, stipulates that all crypto miners using more than 6,000 kWh of electricity per month must sign up to the register. Regulation Trumps Bans, MP Claims The FTS requires firms on its list to provide it with data on the number of coins they mine and the wallets where they hold their crypto. The tax body will also begin requiring firms on the list to pay taxes on their earnings. This could bring the Russian Treasury revenues of over $500 million per year, industry chiefs have claimed. Nechayev praised his fellow lawmakers for adopting the mining law in the fall of 2024. He said that MPs had acted with prudence by choosing to regulate, and not outlaw, mining. The lawmaker explained: ‚ÄúDriving people into the shadows with fines and bans is not an effective strategy.‚Äù Nechayev added that prior to the rollout of the new law, miners were forced to work in a grey, quasi-legal manner. The Russian lawmaker Alexey Nechaev. (Source: duma.gov.ru [CC BY 4.0]) Some miners, he noted, had tried to be transparent about their activities, but could not pay taxes as most of their businesses were not officially recognized. Nechayev said that this had previously led to ‚Äúentire cities and districts‚Äù being left without electricity because miners overloaded power grids. Miners: Investing in AI Prior to the law, only 91 firms with crypto mining operations were able to register their businesses. This figure has now shot up to over 1,000, Nechayev said. Turkish Foreign Minister Fidan speaks after Russia and Ukraine peace talks https://t.co/f4gqZC5IJc ‚Äî Reuters (@Reuters) July 23, 2025 The New People chief added that industrial miners are also investing in AI. He claimed that this year alone, crypto miners had spent 5 billion rubles ($63 million) on AI development. Nechaev claimed miners were now more likely to invest their money in Russia, rather than send it abroad. Furthermore, he concluded, many mining-related power outages have stopped. World‚Äôs Number 2 Bitcoin Miner? The Association of Industrial Miners, the doemstic mining sector‚Äôs biggest industry group, claims Russia is now consistently ranking second in the world in terms of Bitcoin (BTC) mining volume. Outputs are second only to those of the USA, the association says. And mining continues to develop, the body noted. This summer, Russian crypto mining firms say their hashrate exceeded 150 EH/s (exahash per second), accounting for 16.6% of the global hashrate. Domestic experts think up to BTC 40,000 (about $4.7 billion) was mined in Russia during the course of 2024. Earlier this month, a top Russian policymaker urged the state to start seizing crypto from illegal crypto miners . He said that a move to officially recongizing coins as a form of intangible property would help courts seize assets from illegal miners. The post Russia Reports x10 Rise In Registered Crypto Mining Firms appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: XRP Projected Price if It Captures 20% of Global E-Commerce Transactions
body: As XRP continues to gain attention in the cryptocurrency sector, some analysts believe the digital asset remains significantly undervalued , particularly in the context of global payment systems. One key area where XRP could see substantial adoption is within e-commerce, a sector prepared for continued growth through the rest of the decade. Evaluating XRP‚Äôs Role in E-Commerce Growth The global e-commerce payments market, valued at approximately $7 trillion in 2024, is expected to increase to $11.4 trillion by 2029, according to industry forecasts. This growth is driven by factors such as the expansion of mobile-first purchasing, increased adoption of digital wallets, and demand for faster, more efficient payment options. While traditional methods like credit and debit cards remain in widespread use, there is a clear shift toward more modern solutions. Digital assets, such as XRP, have been identified as strong contenders in this evolving landscape. In August 2024, Web3 Enabler, a Salesforce Web3 partner, emphasized XRP‚Äôs potential in cross-border and domestic e-commerce transactions. The cryptocurrency‚Äôs rapid settlement time and minimal transaction fees were cited as advantages that align with the needs of both merchants and consumers. To understand the potential price impact if XRP were to power a portion of global e-commerce activity, we explored a scenario where XRP handles 20% of the projected 2029 transaction volume, equivalent to approximately $2.28 trillion annually. Projected XRP Valuation Based on Utility Model To estimate the corresponding XRP valuation, two analytical approaches were considered. The first model evaluates XRP based on pure utility, where the token functions as a core transaction layer within the payments ecosystem, similar to how liquidity assets are used by financial institutions. Using the Velocity of Money formula , and assuming each XRP token circulates four times per year, the model indicates a required market capitalization of $570 billion to facilitate $2.28 trillion in annual transactions. With an assumed circulating supply of 60 billion tokens, this places XRP at $9.50. If token velocity is lower, say, each XRP token is used only twice annually, then more value must be assigned to each unit to support the same transaction volume. Under these conditions, the model projects a price of $19.00 per XRP. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 Speculative Value Projection Based on Market Sentiment A second model considers the impact of market speculation, where investor enthusiasm and forward-looking expectations drive valuation before actual utility is fully realized. This is consistent with how assets like Bitcoin gained early value largely on anticipated use rather than immediate adoption. By applying a 15x speculative multiplier to the $570 billion utility-based market cap, this approach arrives at a projected market capitalization of $8.55 trillion. Dividing this figure by the same 60 billion circulating XRP tokens results in a theoretical price of $142.50 per token. Although these models are hypothetical and depend on multiple assumptions, including transaction volume, token velocity, and investor sentiment, they highlight the substantial upside that could materialize if XRP secures a meaningful share of the e-commerce market. Whether driven by practical use or speculative investment, XRP‚Äôs future price may reflect a broader shift in how global payments are processed in the digital age. title: STRC Stock: Strategy‚Äôs Bold $2.5 Billion Offering Unveiled
body: BitcoinWorld STRC Stock: Strategy‚Äôs Bold $2.5 Billion Offering Unveiled In a move that has sent ripples across the cryptocurrency and traditional financial markets, Strategy, a prominent Bitcoin treasury firm, is poised to make a monumental capital raise. The company is set to secure an astonishing $2.5 billion through an expanded offering of its Variable Rate Series A Perpetual Stretch Preferred Stock, widely recognized as STRC Stock . This significant development, initially reported by Bitcoin News on X citing a notice from Fidelity, marks a pivotal moment for the firm and potentially for the broader digital asset space. From an initial filing of 5 million shares, the offering has been upsized dramatically to 28,011,111 shares, priced at $90 per share. This isn‚Äôt just a routine financial maneuver; it‚Äôs a strategic declaration of intent, signaling profound confidence in Bitcoin‚Äôs long-term trajectory and Strategy‚Äôs role within it. For anyone tracking the confluence of institutional finance and cryptocurrency, understanding the implications of this colossal STRC Stock offering is paramount. What Exactly is STRC Stock? Unpacking the Preferred Share Offering Before diving into the strategic implications, it‚Äôs crucial to grasp the nature of STRC Stock . Unlike common stock, preferred stock offers a unique blend of features that appeal to a specific class of investors. Strategy‚Äôs Variable Rate Series A Perpetual Stretch Preferred Stock carries several distinctive characteristics: Preferred Dividends: Holders of preferred stock typically receive fixed dividend payments before common stockholders. In this case, it‚Äôs a ‚ÄòVariable Rate,‚Äô meaning the dividend yield can fluctuate, often tied to a benchmark rate, offering some protection against inflation or rising interest rates. Perpetual Nature: ‚ÄòPerpetual‚Äô implies that there is no maturity date for the stock. It remains outstanding indefinitely, providing a continuous stream of income to investors unless redeemed by the issuer. Seniority in Liquidation: In the event of liquidation, preferred stockholders have a higher claim on the company‚Äôs assets than common stockholders, offering a layer of security. Non-Voting Rights: Generally, preferred stock does not come with voting rights, allowing the issuing company‚Äôs common shareholders to maintain control. This type of offering is a common tool for companies seeking to raise substantial capital without diluting the voting power of existing common shareholders or incurring traditional debt obligations that might carry more restrictive covenants. For Strategy, the issuance of STRC Stock allows them to tap into a broader investor base, including institutions and individuals seeking steady income streams combined with exposure to a company deeply integrated with Bitcoin. Why Did Strategy Upsize This STRC Stock Offering So Dramatically? The decision to upsize the STRC Stock offering from 5 million to over 28 million shares is a clear indicator of overwhelming demand and Strategy‚Äôs ambitious growth plans. Several factors likely contributed to this significant expansion: Robust Investor Demand: The initial filing likely garnered far more interest than anticipated, signaling strong market appetite for instruments tied to Bitcoin exposure, especially from a reputable firm like Strategy. This suggests a growing institutional comfort with indirect Bitcoin investments. Capital for Bitcoin Accumulation: Strategy‚Äôs core business strategy revolves around accumulating Bitcoin. A larger capital raise means greater capacity to acquire more BTC, especially during periods of market volatility or price dips, allowing them to capitalize on opportunities. Strengthening the Balance Sheet: The influx of capital bolsters Strategy‚Äôs financial position, providing a stronger foundation for future operations, strategic initiatives, and potential market downturns. Strategic Positioning: By raising such a substantial amount, Strategy reinforces its position as a leading corporate holder of Bitcoin, potentially deterring competitors and solidifying its brand in the digital asset ecosystem. Favorable Market Conditions: Despite market fluctuations, the long-term bullish sentiment around Bitcoin, coupled with increasing institutional adoption, creates a fertile ground for such capital raises. Investors are looking for diversified ways to gain exposure to the digital asset. This upsize is not merely an adjustment; it‚Äôs a testament to the market‚Äôs confidence in Strategy‚Äôs vision and the enduring appeal of Bitcoin as a treasury asset. The sheer scale of the STRC Stock offering underscores the maturity of the crypto market and the increasing sophistication of financial instruments designed to bridge traditional finance with digital assets. How Does This STRC Stock Sale Impact Strategy‚Äôs Bitcoin Treasury? The primary implication of this colossal STRC Stock offering directly concerns Strategy‚Äôs Bitcoin treasury. As a firm committed to Bitcoin as its primary treasury reserve asset, the $2.5 billion infusion will undoubtedly be channeled towards further BTC acquisitions. This has several key ramifications: Increased Bitcoin Holdings: With $2.5 billion in fresh capital, Strategy can significantly expand its existing Bitcoin reserves, cementing its status as one of the largest corporate holders of the cryptocurrency. This move reinforces their long-term conviction in Bitcoin‚Äôs value proposition. Enhanced Market Influence: A larger Bitcoin treasury gives Strategy more weight and influence within the Bitcoin ecosystem. Their continued accumulation can impact market dynamics, albeit indirectly, by absorbing supply from the open market. Validation of Bitcoin Strategy: The successful and upsized STRC Stock offering serves as a strong validation of Strategy‚Äôs unique corporate strategy. It demonstrates that investors are willing to back a company whose primary asset is Bitcoin, signaling growing mainstream acceptance. Flexibility for Future Operations: While primarily for Bitcoin, the capital raise also provides Strategy with greater financial flexibility for operational expenses, technology investments, or other strategic endeavors that support their Bitcoin-centric mission. This move is more than just fundraising; it‚Äôs a strategic reaffirmation of Strategy‚Äôs commitment to Bitcoin, potentially setting a precedent for other corporations considering similar treasury strategies. The scale of the STRC Stock sale reflects a belief that Bitcoin remains an undervalued asset with substantial growth potential. Navigating the Opportunities and Challenges of STRC Stock for Investors For investors, the STRC Stock offering presents both compelling opportunities and inherent challenges that warrant careful consideration. Understanding these aspects is crucial for making informed decisions. Opportunities for Investors: Yield and Income: Preferred stock, especially perpetual ones, offers a consistent income stream through dividends, which can be attractive in a volatile market where capital appreciation is uncertain. The variable rate also offers some inflation hedge. Indirect Bitcoin Exposure: For investors who want exposure to Bitcoin but prefer not to hold the volatile asset directly, STRC Stock offers a regulated, publicly traded vehicle to gain indirect exposure through a company deeply invested in BTC. Seniority and Stability: The senior claim on assets in liquidation provides a degree of safety compared to common stock, making it appealing to more conservative investors. Diversification: It can serve as a diversification tool within a broader investment portfolio, offering a different risk-reward profile than direct crypto holdings or traditional equities. Challenges and Considerations for Investors: Limited Upside: Unlike common stock, preferred stock typically does not participate in the full upside potential of a company‚Äôs growth beyond its fixed dividend. Its price appreciation is usually limited. Interest Rate Sensitivity: While the variable rate offers some protection, preferred stocks can still be sensitive to interest rate changes. Rising rates can make existing preferred stock less attractive. Call Risk: Issuers often have the right to ‚Äòcall‚Äô or redeem preferred stock after a certain period, which can cut short an investor‚Äôs income stream, especially if interest rates fall. Market Liquidity: Preferred stocks can sometimes be less liquid than common stocks, making it harder to buy or sell large quantities without impacting the price. Reliance on Strategy‚Äôs Performance: The value and dividend payments of STRC Stock are ultimately tied to the financial health and strategic success of Strategy as a company. Investors must weigh these factors against their individual financial goals and risk tolerance. The STRC Stock offers a unique blend of income and indirect Bitcoin exposure, making it a distinctive asset class in the current market. Strategic Implications: Broader Market Ripples from the STRC Stock Offering Strategy‚Äôs massive STRC Stock offering isn‚Äôt just a corporate finance story; it has broader implications for the cryptocurrency market and institutional adoption of digital assets. This move could: Pioneer New Funding Models: The success of such a large preferred stock offering, explicitly tied to Bitcoin treasury, could inspire other public companies to explore similar non-dilutive or debt-alternative funding mechanisms to acquire or hold digital assets. Bolster Institutional Confidence: The sheer scale and apparent demand for this offering signal a growing comfort among traditional institutional investors with allocating capital to companies deeply involved in the Bitcoin ecosystem. This is a powerful vote of confidence. Set a Precedent for Crypto-Centric Firms: As the crypto industry matures, more companies are looking for robust and diversified funding sources. Strategy‚Äôs approach with STRC Stock could become a blueprint for others. Impact Bitcoin‚Äôs Supply Dynamics: Continued large-scale accumulation by public companies like Strategy, fueled by successful capital raises, further constrains the available supply of Bitcoin on exchanges, potentially contributing to price appreciation over the long term. Influence Regulatory Perceptions: The transparency and regulated nature of a publicly traded preferred stock offering might positively influence regulatory bodies‚Äô perceptions of the crypto space, encouraging more structured and compliant participation. This offering is a testament to the increasing sophistication of the financial instruments available for gaining exposure to digital assets. It highlights a growing trend where traditional finance is not just observing but actively integrating with the cryptocurrency world, with STRC Stock acting as a significant bridge. Looking Ahead: What Does the Future Hold for Strategy and STRC Stock? The successful upsized offering of STRC Stock positions Strategy for an intriguing future. With a substantial war chest, the firm is now better equipped than ever to execute its Bitcoin-centric strategy. The coming months and years will likely see Strategy continue its accumulation of Bitcoin, potentially becoming an even more dominant corporate holder. This ongoing accumulation, supported by instruments like STRC Stock , could solidify its market leadership and influence. For investors in STRC Stock , the future hinges on Strategy‚Äôs continued financial health, its ability to manage its Bitcoin treasury effectively, and the overall performance of Bitcoin itself. While preferred stock offers relative stability, its value is intrinsically linked to the underlying assets and the issuing company‚Äôs strategic prowess. As the crypto landscape evolves, Strategy‚Äôs innovative approach to capital raising through STRC Stock will undoubtedly be watched closely by market participants globally. Conclusion: A Landmark Moment for Strategy and STRC Stock Strategy‚Äôs audacious $2.5 billion expanded offering of STRC Stock is far more than a simple fundraising event; it‚Äôs a profound statement of conviction in Bitcoin‚Äôs future and a pioneering example of how traditional financial instruments are adapting to the digital asset era. By dramatically upsizing this preferred stock sale, Strategy has not only secured substantial capital for its Bitcoin treasury but has also demonstrated robust investor confidence in its unique business model. This move underscores the growing institutional appetite for indirect Bitcoin exposure and sets a potential precedent for how other companies might leverage financial markets to engage with cryptocurrencies. The success of the STRC Stock offering highlights a maturing market where innovation, strategic foresight, and strong conviction are paving the way for a deeper integration of digital assets into the global financial fabric. It‚Äôs a compelling narrative of growth, ambition, and the evolving dynamics of wealth in the digital age. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) About STRC Stock 1. What is STRC Stock? STRC Stock refers to Strategy‚Äôs Variable Rate Series A Perpetual Stretch Preferred Stock. It‚Äôs a type of equity that typically pays fixed dividends and has a higher claim on assets than common stock in case of liquidation, but usually does not carry voting rights. Its ‚Äòvariable rate‚Äô means dividends can adjust, and ‚Äòperpetual‚Äô means it has no maturity date. 2. Why did Strategy expand its STRC Stock offering? Strategy expanded its STRC Stock offering from 5 million to over 28 million shares primarily due to overwhelming investor demand. This upsize also allows the company to raise significantly more capital ($2.5 billion) to further increase its Bitcoin holdings and strengthen its balance sheet, reflecting strong confidence in its Bitcoin treasury strategy. 3. How does STRC Stock differ from common stock? Unlike common stock, STRC Stock (preferred stock) generally offers fixed or variable dividend payments, has no voting rights, and holds a senior position in receiving payments during liquidation. Common stock, conversely, typically has voting rights, variable dividends (or none), and a junior claim on assets, but offers greater potential for capital appreciation. 4. What are the main benefits for investors in STRC Stock? Investors in STRC Stock can benefit from consistent dividend income, indirect exposure to Bitcoin through Strategy‚Äôs treasury, and a higher priority in receiving payments during liquidation compared to common stockholders. It offers a relatively stable investment option within the crypto-adjacent market. 5. Does investing in STRC Stock mean I directly own Bitcoin? No, investing in STRC Stock means you own shares in Strategy, the company, not Bitcoin directly. Your investment is tied to the performance and strategy of the company, which in turn heavily invests in Bitcoin. It provides indirect exposure to Bitcoin without the complexities of direct crypto custody or trading. 6. What are the potential risks of investing in STRC Stock? Potential risks include limited capital appreciation compared to common stock, sensitivity to interest rate changes, the possibility of the stock being ‚Äòcalled‚Äô (redeemed) by Strategy, and general market liquidity concerns. Its value is also dependent on Strategy‚Äôs overall financial health and the long-term performance of Bitcoin. Share Your Insights! What are your thoughts on Strategy‚Äôs massive STRC Stock offering and its implications for the Bitcoin market? Do you think this sets a new precedent for corporate capital raises in the crypto space? Share this article on your social media channels and join the conversation! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin institutional adoption. This post STRC Stock: Strategy‚Äôs Bold $2.5 Billion Offering Unveiled first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Expert: 500 XRP Has the Power to Change Lives. Here‚Äôs why
body: A recent statement by Edoardo Farina, a well-known figure in the XRP community and founder of Alpha Lions Academy, has stirred debate within the cryptocurrency space. Farina argues that owning just 500 XRP tokens could be enough to significantly impact a person‚Äôs financial future. Farina Lowers the Bar for ‚ÄúLife-Changing‚Äù Holdings Historically , Farina has advised investors to aim for higher XRP holdings, often citing 10,000 tokens as the threshold for potential financial independence. However, his latest remarks signal a shift in perspective. He now asserts that even a relatively small holding of 500 XRP might offer substantial returns in the long term. Currently, with XRP trading at approximately $3.21 , a portfolio of 500 tokens equates to about $1,600 in value. This amount is modest by investment standards, falling below the average monthly rent in several U.S. cities. Yet, Farina believes the coin‚Äôs future trajectory could transform that seemingly minor investment into something far more meaningful. Assessing Potential Growth Scenarios To evaluate the validity of this outlook, it‚Äôs useful to consider projected price targets by prominent market analysts. One such analyst, EGRAG, continues to forecast that XRP could eventually climb to $27. If this projection materializes, a 500-token portfolio would grow to $13,500, a sizable return, though not necessarily life-changing for most investors. Farina‚Äôs target, however, is significantly more aggressive. He maintains that XRP could eventually reach $100 per token . At that price, 500 tokens would be worth $50,000, a notable increase, but still below the estimated $77,000 average annual expenditure of a U.S. household, according to data from the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 What Would Make 500 XRP Life-Changing? To reach a valuation that could substantially alter an individual‚Äôs financial circumstances, XRP would likely need to surge to at least $1,000 per coin. Under this scenario, a 500-token investment would balloon to $500,000, representing a 31,150% increase from its current worth. While such a target may appear unrealistic to some, it is not without precedent in the XRP community. Earlier this year, Matthew Brienen, Chief Operating Officer of CryptoGuard, proposed that XRP could indeed hit $1,000 within five to ten years, citing evolving financial infrastructure and greater institutional interest as potential catalysts. Although the idea that 500 XRP could change a life might seem exaggerated under current market conditions, it reflects a broader optimism shared by committed XRP advocates. For such an outcome to occur, however, the asset would need to experience extraordinary growth. Until then, this perspective remains speculative, though not entirely out of step with the ambitious projections made by some industry experts. title: Higher Bitcoin Price Now Critical For US Fiscal Stability, Expert Warns
body: Jack Mallers, founder of Strike, argued in a video shared on X that a structurally higher Bitcoin price is emerging as a necessary component of US fiscal management, linking the growth of stablecoins to demand for US government debt. Framing the newly introduced GENIUS Act stablecoin legislation as ‚Äúa seminal moment for digital assets and global dollar dominance,‚Äù Mallers said that while the bill ‚Äúhas nothing to do with Bitcoin directly,‚Äù it is indirectly significant because stablecoin expansion and Bitcoin appreciation are, in his view, intertwined. Bitcoin And Gold Must Rise To Avert US Fiscal Crisis Displaying a chart of Tether‚Äôs market capitalization alongside Bitcoin‚Äôs price, Mallers told viewers: ‚ÄúIn the green, what you‚Äôre looking at is Tether, Market Cap. And in the orange, what you‚Äôre looking at is Bitcoin‚Ä¶ The currency pair that does the most volume against this asset class is USDT, is Tether‚Ä¶ If you want stablecoins to grow, Bitcoin grows.‚Äù He then connected that relationship to federal financing: stablecoin issuers, especially Tether, hold large amounts of US Treasuries; therefore, a larger stablecoin float would translate into incremental structural demand for US debt. Related Reading: Are Traders Walking Into a Bitcoin Bull Trap at $118K? Here‚Äôs What the Data Shows Mallers described the United States as fiscally ‚Äútrapped,‚Äù asserting: ‚ÄúWe know that the US cannot raise rates and they cannot cut spending. So we are trapped. The next logical step is we then need to devalue the dollar. It‚Äôs the only way out.‚Äù The policy question, he continued, is what assets the dollar should be allowed to depreciate against. ‚ÄúDo not debase the dollar against housing‚Ä¶ Don‚Äôt debase the dollar against eggs‚Ä¶ My recommendation, debase it against Bitcoin and gold.‚Äù Projecting a scenario in which Bitcoin reaches $500,000‚Äî‚ÄúThat‚Äôs 5x from here‚Äù‚ÄîMallers claimed such a move would force stablecoin capitalization to ‚Äú5x,‚Äù producing ‚Äúfive times the amount of demand for US debt‚Äù at a moment when, he said, traditional foreign and domestic buyers are fatigued: ‚ÄúChina doesn‚Äôt want your debt‚Ä¶ Hedge funds don‚Äôt want your debt. Who‚Äôs the buyer of last resort? The Fed.‚Äù He likened the prospective alignment of Treasury financing needs, Federal Reserve balance-sheet expansion, and stablecoin reserve composition to a previous historical episode: ‚ÄúThe last time the Fed and the US government got married‚Ä¶ was to help finance around the world wars. And the Fed‚Äôs balance sheet grew 10 times‚Ä¶ largely in‚Ä¶ T-bills, the things that stablecoins buy.‚Äù Related Reading: Bitcoin Consolidates Below $120K as Exchange Activity Reflects Mixed Market Signals With US debt-to-GDP ‚Äúat 130%,‚Äù Mallers argued, reduction in real terms requires monetary debasement channeled into politically acceptable asset inflation. He extended the narrative into politics, highlighting that ‚ÄúThe president and his family just bought $2 billion worth of Bitcoin‚Äù and policy moves such as opening ‚ÄúUS retirement market to crypto investments.‚Äù According to Mallers, positioning Bitcoin and gold inside retirement accounts will allow policymakers to ‚Äúdebase the dollar and get reelected,‚Äù because Bitcoin holders would not resist the erosion of purchasing power: ‚ÄúDebase the dollar all you want‚Ä¶ I don‚Äôt care because I own Bitcoin.‚Äù He concluded by restating the mechanism he sees emerging from the bill: ‚ÄúStablecoins are the new way to finance the government, but they grow as Bitcoin grows. One way to grow stablecoins is to grow Bitcoin‚Ä¶ One way to solve the Fed and the Treasury‚Äôs problem of getting remarried is to grow Bitcoin. It could not be more obvious.‚Äù At press time, BTC traded at $118,055. Featured image created with DALL.E, chart from TradingView.com

title: Wells Fargo Banker Banned From Leaving China After Being Allegedly Implicated in Criminal Case: Report
body: China‚Äôs foreign ministry has reportedly confirmed that a visiting Atlanta-based banker who works for the financial service behemoth Wells Fargo has been prohibited from leaving the country. CNN reports that the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs spokesperson Guo Jiakun said on Monday that the exit ban placed on Chenyue Mao is due to her involvement in a criminal case. Mao serves as managing director at Wells Fargo Bank N.A. ‚ÄúAccording to Chinese law, the case is under investigation, and Ms. Mao is temporarily unable to leave the country and is obligated to cooperate with the investigation. During the investigation, the authorities will ensure that her legal rights are protected.‚Äù The bank, which operates overseas branches in Shanghai and Beijing, decided to suspend all travel to China following the exit restrictions. ‚ÄúWe are closely tracking this situation and working through the appropriate channels so our employee can return to the United States as soon as possible.‚Äù It is not clear how Mao is linked to the criminal case. Just last month, she was elected the new chair of FCI, a global association of companies formerly known as the Factors Chain International. In a statement to the BBC, the US embassy in Shanghai says that the Chinese government has long imposed exit bans on US citizens and other foreign nationals, often without a clear and transparent judicial process. ‚ÄúWe track these cases closely, and have raised our concern with Chinese authorities about the impact these arbitrary exit bans have on our bilateral relations and urged them to immediately allow impacted US citizens to return home.‚Äù Follow us on X , Facebook and Telegram Don't Miss a Beat ‚Äì Subscribe to get email alerts delivered directly to your inbox Check Price Action Surf The Daily Hodl Mix Disclaimer: Opinions expressed at The Daily Hodl are not investment advice. title: ProCap Financial Merger: A Monumental Step Towards Billion-Dollar Bitcoin Ambitions
body: BitcoinWorld ProCap Financial Merger: A Monumental Step Towards Billion-Dollar Bitcoin Ambitions The cryptocurrency landscape is constantly evolving, marked by groundbreaking innovations and significant institutional moves. One such development capturing the attention of the financial world is the proposed ProCap Financial merger . This strategic alliance aims to bridge the burgeoning digital asset space with traditional finance, promising a future where Bitcoin plays an even more central role in mainstream investment portfolios. Let‚Äôs delve into the latest update that signals a major leap forward for this ambitious venture. What is the ProCap Financial Merger All About? At its core, the ProCap Financial merger represents a bold fusion of two distinct entities: ProCap BTC and Columbus Circle Capital Corp I (CCCM). ProCap BTC is a Bitcoin-native financial services firm, renowned for its focus on digital assets and founded by the influential crypto investor, Anthony Pompliano. On the other side, CCCM is a special-purpose acquisition company (SPAC), a vehicle designed to raise capital through an initial public offering (IPO) with the purpose of acquiring an existing company. The goal of this business combination is to create a publicly traded entity, ProCap Financial, that will offer a comprehensive suite of financial services deeply rooted in the Bitcoin ecosystem. This move is particularly significant as it signals a growing trend of established financial structures embracing the decentralized world of cryptocurrency, paving the way for broader institutional adoption. Why is the Draft S-4 Filing a Critical Milestone for the ProCap Financial Merger? In a pivotal move, ProCap Financial has officially submitted a draft registration statement on Form S-4 to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). This filing, announced via a July 24 press release on PR Newswire, is far more than just bureaucratic paperwork; it is a critical milestone in the journey toward finalizing the ProCap Financial merger . What is an S-4? Form S-4 is a registration statement required by the SEC for business combinations, such as mergers or acquisitions. It provides comprehensive information about the transaction, including financial details, business plans of the combined entity, and risks involved, to potential investors. Ensuring Transparency: The filing mandates full disclosure, ensuring that all relevant information about ProCap Financial, its operations, and its financial health is made public. This transparency is vital for investor confidence and regulatory oversight. Regulatory Scrutiny: The SEC will meticulously review the S-4 filing. This process ensures compliance with securities laws and protects investors from potential fraud. While the draft filing marks progress, the merger is still subject to SEC approval and other customary closing conditions. Paving the Way for Public Listing: Once approved, the S-4 allows the combined entity to issue new shares to complete the merger, effectively leading to ProCap Financial becoming a publicly traded company. This will open doors for a wider range of investors to gain exposure to a Bitcoin-centric financial services firm. Anthony Pompliano‚Äôs Bold Vision: A Billion-Dollar Bitcoin Ambition Central to the narrative of the ProCap Financial merger is the ambitious vision spearheaded by Anthony Pompliano. A well-known figure in the crypto space, Pompliano has consistently advocated for Bitcoin‚Äôs role as a store of value and a foundational asset for the future financial system. His firm, ProCap BTC, was founded on these principles, aiming to build a financial services company specifically tailored for the Bitcoin economy. A particularly audacious goal previously disclosed by the firm is its aim to hold up to $1 billion in Bitcoin on its balance sheet. This commitment is not merely a statement; it‚Äôs a strategic decision that could have profound implications: Strong Signal to the Market: A billion-dollar Bitcoin holding by a publicly traded financial entity would send a powerful signal to traditional finance, validating Bitcoin as a legitimate, institutional-grade asset. Increased Demand: Such a significant acquisition would contribute to increased demand for Bitcoin, potentially influencing its market dynamics and price trajectory. Blueprint for Others: If successful, ProCap Financial could serve as a blueprint for other financial institutions looking to integrate Bitcoin into their operations and balance sheets, accelerating the broader institutional adoption trend. This commitment underscores ProCap Financial‚Äôs belief in Bitcoin‚Äôs long-term value and its potential to reshape the financial landscape. Navigating the Regulatory Currents: The SEC‚Äôs Role in the ProCap Financial Merger The journey of any significant financial entity in the United States invariably involves navigating the complex regulatory framework overseen by the SEC. For the ProCap Financial merger , the SEC‚Äôs review of the S-4 filing is a critical hurdle that must be cleared. The SEC‚Äôs primary mandate is investor protection, and it approaches the nascent crypto industry with a degree of caution, given its volatility and evolving nature. While the regulatory landscape for cryptocurrencies is still taking shape, filings like the S-4 provide a structured pathway for crypto-native companies to gain legitimacy within traditional financial systems. ProCap Financial‚Äôs proactive engagement with the SEC through this formal filing demonstrates a commitment to compliance and transparency, which are crucial for fostering trust among institutional investors and the broader public. The SEC‚Äôs review process, though potentially lengthy, is a necessary step to ensure that the combined entity operates under established financial regulations, providing a level of security and oversight that is often lacking in less regulated corners of the crypto market. Unlocking Potential: Benefits of the ProCap Financial Merger for the Crypto Ecosystem The successful completion of the ProCap Financial merger could usher in a wave of benefits, not just for the involved entities but for the entire cryptocurrency ecosystem. This strategic alliance is poised to: Enhance Institutional Access: By becoming a publicly traded entity, ProCap Financial will make it easier for institutional investors, who are often restricted from investing in private or less regulated crypto firms, to gain exposure to Bitcoin-centric financial services. Increase Credibility and Legitimacy: Operating under the purview of the SEC and being publicly traded lends significant credibility to the Bitcoin space, helping to dispel lingering skepticism from traditional finance. Drive Innovation: The combined expertise of a Bitcoin-native firm and a SPAC with traditional financial structuring could foster new financial products and services that bridge the gap between digital assets and conventional markets. Pioneer a New Model: ProCap Financial could set a precedent for how crypto companies can successfully integrate into traditional financial structures, potentially inspiring similar mergers and acquisitions in the future. These benefits collectively contribute to the maturation and mainstream acceptance of Bitcoin and the broader digital asset economy. Potential Hurdles: Challenges on the Path Ahead for the ProCap Financial Merger While the prospects of the ProCap Financial merger are exciting, it‚Äôs important to acknowledge the potential challenges that lie ahead. No major business combination is without its complexities, especially when bridging two vastly different financial worlds: Regulatory Approvals and Delays: The SEC‚Äôs review process can be extensive, and unforeseen questions or requirements could lead to delays. The evolving nature of crypto regulation also poses a dynamic challenge. Market Volatility: Bitcoin, despite its growing maturity, remains a volatile asset. Managing a billion-dollar Bitcoin balance sheet will require sophisticated risk management strategies to navigate market fluctuations. Integration Complexities: Merging two distinct corporate cultures and operational frameworks‚Äîone steeped in traditional finance and the other agile and crypto-native‚Äîcan be challenging. Ensuring seamless integration of systems, teams, and strategies will be crucial. Maintaining Ethos: ProCap BTC‚Äôs ‚ÄòBitcoin-native‚Äô identity is a core strength. The challenge will be to scale and integrate into a public company structure without diluting this foundational ethos. Successfully overcoming these hurdles will be key to realizing the full potential of the ProCap Financial merger. What Does This Mean for the Average Crypto Investor? Actionable Insights. For individual crypto investors, the progression of the ProCap Financial merger offers several key takeaways and actionable insights: Monitor Institutional Trends: This merger is a prime example of increasing institutional interest and adoption in Bitcoin. Keeping an eye on such developments can provide clues about future market movements and long-term trends. Long-Term Validation for Bitcoin: The commitment to holding a significant amount of Bitcoin on a public company‚Äôs balance sheet reinforces Bitcoin‚Äôs narrative as a legitimate, investable asset, potentially strengthening its long-term price trajectory. New Investment Avenues: Once ProCap Financial becomes publicly traded, it could offer a new way for investors to gain exposure to the Bitcoin ecosystem through a traditional stock market vehicle, diversifying their investment strategies. Focus on Fundamentals: As institutional players enter the space, the emphasis on regulatory compliance, transparent operations, and strong business models will increase. Investors should consider these factors when evaluating crypto-related companies. This merger underscores that the crypto market is maturing, attracting serious capital and demanding higher standards of operation. In conclusion, the filing of the draft S-4 for the proposed ProCap Financial merger between ProCap BTC and CCCM marks a truly monumental step in the evolution of institutional Bitcoin adoption. It signifies a serious commitment to bringing Bitcoin-native financial services into the mainstream, backed by regulatory compliance and ambitious balance sheet goals. While challenges remain, the potential benefits for the crypto ecosystem‚Äîfrom enhanced credibility to increased institutional access‚Äîare immense. This development serves as a powerful testament to Bitcoin‚Äôs enduring appeal and its growing role in shaping the future of finance. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What is ProCap Financial? ProCap Financial is the proposed combined entity resulting from the merger of ProCap BTC, a Bitcoin-native financial services firm founded by Anthony Pompliano, and Columbus Circle Capital Corp I (CCCM), a special-purpose acquisition company (SPAC). Why is the S-4 filing important for the ProCap Financial merger? The S-4 filing is a draft registration statement submitted to the SEC for business combinations like mergers. It‚Äôs crucial because it provides transparency, details the terms of the merger, and is a necessary step for the combined entity to become publicly traded, subject to SEC approval. What is Anthony Pompliano‚Äôs goal for ProCap Financial‚Äôs Bitcoin holdings? Anthony Pompliano‚Äôs firm, ProCap BTC, has an ambitious goal for the combined ProCap Financial to hold up to $1 billion in Bitcoin on its balance sheet, signaling a strong commitment to the cryptocurrency as a core asset. How will the ProCap Financial merger impact the broader crypto market? The ProCap Financial merger is expected to enhance institutional access to Bitcoin, increase the credibility and legitimacy of the crypto space within traditional finance, and potentially inspire other financial institutions to integrate digital assets, driving further mainstream adoption. What are the main challenges facing the ProCap Financial merger? Key challenges include navigating the SEC‚Äôs regulatory approval process, managing Bitcoin‚Äôs market volatility, ensuring seamless integration of two distinct corporate cultures and operational frameworks, and maintaining ProCap BTC‚Äôs Bitcoin-native ethos post-merger.
